description: Position of 2^n among the powers of primes (A000961).
comments: A000961(a(n)) = A000079(n); also position of record values in A192015: A001787(n) = A192015(a(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 26 2011
links: Hiroaki Yamanouchi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..53
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {v = vector(2^nn, i, i); vpp = select(x->ispp(x), v); print1(1, ", "); for (i=1, #vpp, if ((vpp[i] % 2) == 0, print1(i, ", ")););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 17 2014(PARI) a(n)=sum(k=1,n,primepi(sqrtnint(2^n,k)))+1 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 21 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
